description: A Difficult Game About Climbing is a rage platformer inspired by Getting Over It.

0.1.0.description:
# Changelog

## APWorld
### Gameplay
- Items:
  - Grip Strength
  - Swinging Metal Beam
  - Metal Beam Angle Increase
  - Deafness Trap
  - Rotating Cog Repair
  - Rotating Cog Halting
  - Side Cog Halting
- Locations: Grabbing 16 different surface types for the first time
- Options:
  - Difficulty: vanilla, extra_buff, challenge
### Docs
- Game info and setup in english

## Client mod
### Gameplay
See APWorld
### QoL
- Game creates separate save files for each connection
- Saving multiple connection details in configs for easier switching between multiworlds and slots
- Offline inventory in configs

## Is this versions mod compatible with older apworlds?
First version, no backwards compatibility possible
0.1.0.title: v0.1.0 (initial release)

0.1.1.description:
# Changelog

## APWorld
No changes, same as last version

## Client mod
### Bug fixes
- Fixed save file paths
- Failed connection did not process offline inventory
### Technicalities
- Added error handling to receiving items

## Is this versions mod compatible with older apworlds?
Yes
0.1.1.title: v0.1.1 (save file fixing update)

0.1.2.description:
# Changelog

## APWorld
No changes, same as 0.1.0

## Client mod
### Technicalities
- Updated to Archipelago.Multiclient.Net 0.6.6, thereby making the client compatible with AP 0.6.2 rooms

## Is this versions mod compatible with older apworlds?
Yes
0.1.2.title: v0.1.2 (AP 0.6.2 compatibility update)
